ya5.3.4:1.1: Yo dukkhasaccaṁ parijānāti so samudayasaccaṁ pajahitthāti? No.
ya5.3.4:2.1: Yo vā pana samudayasaccaṁ pajahittha so dukkhasaccaṁ parijānātīti? No.
ya5.3.4:3.1: Yo dukkhasaccaṁ na parijānāti so samudayasaccaṁ nappajahitthāti?
ya5.3.4:4.1_0: Arahā dukkhasaccaṁ na parijānāti, no ca samudayasaccaṁ nappajahittha. Aggamaggasamaṅgiñca
ya5.3.4:4.1_1: arahantañca ṭhapetvā avasesā puggalā dukkhasaccañca na parijānanti samudayasaccañca nappajahittha.
ya5.3.4:5.1: Yo vā pana samudayasaccaṁ nappajahittha so dukkhasaccaṁ na parijānātīti?
ya5.3.4:6.1_0: Aggamaggasamaṅgī samudayasaccaṁ nappajahittha, no ca dukkhasaccaṁ na parijānāti.
ya5.3.4:6.1_1: Aggamaggasamaṅgiñca arahantañca ṭhapetvā avasesā puggalā samudayasaccañca nappajahittha
